Looking for a Kia Soul near Washington?

The Kia Soul remains one of best values on the market, priced in line with compact sedans, and it is very well-equipped and quite fuel-efficient. With the Soul's tiny parking footprint, it's easy to maneuver and park, packing impressive interior space thanks to the boxy profile. With the largest selection of cars from dealers and private sellers, Autotrader can help find the perfect Soul for you.

Autotrader has 14,092 Kia Souls for sale near Washington, DC, including a Certified 2017 Kia Soul +, a Certified 2017 Kia Soul EV, and a Certified 2018 Kia Soul ! w/ Tech Package.

Not sure if a Soul is the right fit for you?

That's okay! We make it easy to shop for your next vehicle by body type, mileage, price, and much more.You can find other popular Kia vehicles such as Niro, Forte, and Telluride on Autotrader.
